name: Freshpaint
headline: Customer data collection, safeguarding, & activation for healthcare
description:
Our customers use Freshpaint to make their websites and entire marketing stack HIPAA compliant. It's impossible to use modern analytics and marketing tools without sharing sensitive HIPAA-regulated data. Our platform does the hard thing of moving data from A to B. And then we do the really hard thing of controlling the flow of sensitive HIPAA-regulated data to various 3rd-party marketing tools.

We're building the data infrastructure that safeguards patient privacy while also enabling marketing teams promote access to healthcare.

founders.name: Michael Malis, Founder
founders.description:
After graduating high school in 2015, I joined Heap. While there I worked on scaling their cluster of Postgres instances that has around a Petabyte of data. I eventually took over and lead the database team there.

While at Heap I shipped a large number of performance improvements and cost savings. You could say I was the primary person who scaled Heap. Due to the number of cost reduction projects I shipped, I was given the nickname "Michael Margins".

## Purpose Built for Healthcare Marketing in a Privacy-Focused World
![Healthcare Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f85c611584a6562a49bf49_Group%20226.svg)
#### Replace unsafe tracking tech
Freshpaint replaces all unsafe tracking technologies with a BAA-supported platform.
[Learn More![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/baa-supported-platform>)
![Safe by Default](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f85c618bb4cd73b0409ae4_Group%20227.svg)
#### Block sensitive data by default
Freshpaint blocks data to any non-compliant tool by default, reducing compliance risks caused by human error.
[Learn More![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/safe-by-default>)

#### Preserve the visitor journey
Freshpaint creates an anonymous identification for every visitor, so you can still get a complete view of the customer journey while protecting privacy.
[Learn More![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/complete-visitor-journey>)
![Avoid High Switching Costs Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f85c6011392cbb3e181058_Group%20229.svg)
#### Avoid high switching costs
Freshpaintâ€™s secure server-side connections make sure tools like Google Analytics and Google Ads work the way you expect without giving them access to sensitive data.
[Learn More![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/secure-server-side-connections>)
## Privacy Makes Healthcare Marketing Harder
The tracking technologies on your website that power advertising and analytics are giant personal user data vacuums that put your organization at risk of violating privacy regulations. As a healthcare marketer, you need to supply data to those tools for maximum ROI, but you have to do it in a HIPAA-compliant way. Freshpaint unlocks that ability. 
[Book a demo](https://freshpaint.io/</contact-sales>)
![Why Tracking Technology is Dangerous for Healthcare](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/66cf4a4aa64c890e6e1afde5_64f867c799ed4c91d4a9bfe7_Group%20230.webp)
![How do Tracking Technologies Violate HIPAA Image? ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f862af84581584f31e8dd4_Container%20\(1\).png)
## How Do Tracking Technologies Violate HIPAA? 
It all comes down to Protected Health Information, or PHI, which is any of the eighteen HIPAA identifiers combined with specific health information. 
Name and email are obvious identifiers, but native trackers automatically collect IP addresses and device IDs, which are also considered identifiers.
When it comes to your website, visits to a page about a specific condition, a search for a doctor, or booking an appointment would be considered health information.
When you combine the two ingredients and share that data with a destination that is not HIPAA-compliant, this is where you run the risk of privacy violations. And thatâ€™s exactly what the tracking technologies on your website do.‍
[Scan Your website for Privacy risks](https://freshpaint.io/<https:/info.freshpaint.io/custom-web-tracker-report>)
## Keep Using Existing Tools By Replacing Native Trackers With Freshpaint
Freshpaint replaces all of your non-compliant tracking technologies to prevent advertising and analytics tools from ever getting PHI.
[Book A Demo](https://freshpaint.io/</contact-sales>)
![Use Freshpaint to Replace Native Trackers Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86847b95f975874be4071_Group%20231.webp)
![Freshpaint BAA Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86913b619c0cbabcac76a_Group%20232.webp)
## Collect Data Using a BAA-Supported Platform
Freshpaint signs a Business Associate Agreement, or BAA, with your healthcare organization so that you can centralize website data collection in one HIPAA-compliant platform. 
[Learn more about centralizing data collection in a BAA-supported platform![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/baa-supported-platform>)
## Make Your Entire Tech Stack Safe By Default
Freshpaint eliminates human error by blocking data to tools that are not HIPAA-compliant by default. You have to opt in before any data is shared.
[Learn more about a privacy-first approach to data sharing![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/safe-by-default>)
![Make Your Tech Stack Safe by Default Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f869447a42611aa2b86068_Image%20\(6\).webp)
![Eliminate Sensitive Data Sharing to Analytics Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86b03a34815a0ab10ba7b_Group%20216.webp)
## Eliminate Sensitive Data Sharing To Web Analytics
A web analytics tool like Google Analytics doesnâ€™t need PHI to work. Freshpaint prevents all of the eighteen HIPAA identifiers from ever being shared while ensuring you get all the reporting you need to measure performance.
[Learn how to turn Google Analytics back on![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</hipaa-compliant-analytics>)
## Do Digital Advertising Without Sharing PHI
Freshpaint makes advertising tools like Facebook Ads and Google Ads HIPAA-compliant by never sharing health information.
[Learn how Freshpaint blocks PHI from advertising tools![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</hipaa-compliant-advertising>)
![Digital Ads without Sharing PHI Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86bb7b664dd9645eb9818_Frame%20149.webp)
![Web Tracker Monitoring Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/65413410adf16b818f973a53_Frame%20125.webp)
## Eliminate Surprises With Monitoring For Web Trackers
Freshpaint gives you better visibility about the trackers installed across your website, so you can more quickly make the decisions that keep you HIPAA-compliant..
[Learn how to detect new web trackers using Freshpaint![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</web-tracker-monitoring>)
## Leverage Existing Tags To Avoid Switching Costs
By leveraging your current Google Tag Manager setup, Freshpaint can help get all of your existing tools up and running again without a big time investment.
![Leveraging Existing Tags Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86cbbd5f596d5aef59574_Group%20233.webp)[Learn how to quickly restore data sharing to your ads and analytics tools![A red arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/5db0bab72dc864feddaaf8c9_arrow-red.svg)](https://freshpaint.io/</product/google-tag-manager-support>)
## Do The Marketing Youâ€™ve Always Imagined
Improve patient lifetime value and build lasting relationships through better customer journey marketing, powered by Freshpaint's behavioral data integration with your other marketing tools.
[Book A Demo](https://freshpaint.io/</contact-sales>)
![Freshpaint Marketing Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5dad2b1e508f04474002459a/64f86d5e404fdcc077d51f46_Group%20234.webp)

## Privacy Makes Healthcare Marketing Harder
The tracking technologies on your website that power advertising and analytics are giant personal user data vacuums that put your organization at risk of violating privacy regulations. As a healthcare marketer, you need to supply data to those tools for maximum ROI, but you have to do it in a HIPAA-compliant way. Freshpaint unlocks that ability. 
Book a demoâŸ¨32âŸ©
![Why Tracking Technology is Dangerous for HealthcareâŸ¨47âŸ©]
![How do Tracking Technologies Violate HIPAA Image? âŸ¨48âŸ©].png)
## How Do Tracking Technologies Violate HIPAA? 
It all comes down to Protected Health Information, or PHI, which is any of the eighteen HIPAA identifiers combined with specific health information. 
Name and email are obvious identifiers, but native trackers automatically collect IP addresses and device IDs, which are also considered identifiers.
When it comes to your website, visits to a page about a specific condition, a search for a doctor, or booking an appointment would be considered health information.
When you combine the two ingredients and share that data with a destination that is not HIPAA-compliant, this is where you run the risk of privacy violations. And thatâ€™s exactly what the tracking technologies on your website do.‍
Scan Your website for Privacy risksâŸ¨49âŸ©

generated_description:
### Freshpaint: Safeguarding Healthcare Data

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Y Combinator's S19 batch, Freshpaint operates in the heart of San Francisco with a dedicated team of around 75 employees. Their core mission? Ensuring that healthcare organizations can collect and activate customer data without compromising patient privacy, all while staying HIPAA compliant. 

**The Challenge**: Traditional web analytics and marketing tools often require sharing sensitive health information. Thatâ€™s a big no-no in the healthcare space, where data privacy is paramount. 

**The Solution**: Freshpaint simplifies this landscape by acting as a robust data infrastructure. Their platform effectively facilitates the transfer of dataâ€”what we can term the "hard part"â€”but it goes further by controlling the flow of sensitive HIPAA-regulated data to third-party marketing tools. Itâ€™s essential for healthcare marketing teams to thrive without the fears of regulatory breaches.

#### Key Features:
- **BAA-Supported Platform**: Freshpaint signs Business Associate Agreements (BAAs) with healthcare organizations, ensuring that patient privacy is prioritized in every interaction. 
- **Safe by Default**: The platform blocks data to non-compliant tools automatically, which effectively reduces risks linked to human errors.
- **Anonymous Tracking**: By creating anonymous identifiers for visitors, Freshpaint lets organizations track customer journeys while still protecting privacy.
- **Integration Capabilities**: Supports integration with popular marketing tools like Google Analytics and advertising services, ensuring organizations can drive insights without compromising on compliance. 

#### Why It Matters:
With increasing privacy regulations and data breaches in the limelight, Freshpaint positions itself as not just a tool, but as a partner for healthcare marketers. They give organizations the ability to market effectively while avoiding pitfalls associated with data sharing. This balance is becoming increasingly crucial in a privacy-first world where patient trust is non-negotiable.

Jared Friedman, a Group Partner at Y Combinator, sums up its potential: Freshpaint enables healthcare providers to utilize digital marketing toolsâ€”previously seen as riskyâ€”effectively and safely.

If youâ€™re in the healthcare sector and concerned about compliance while wanting to optimize your marketing strategies, Freshpaint could be your game changer. Check them out [here](https://freshpaint.io) for more details or to book a demo.
